The current price of ADA is $1.43. ADA has maintained a price > $1 since early February (4 months) and, while the price has been dropping since its ATH, is not dropping that quickly. Therefore, assuming a stable rate of deprecation, the price will stay above $1 until July. On-top of this Cardano is rolling out smart contracts which will increase the number of users and should result in an increase of price. I don't believe the price will increase drastically to $2.50 (it's too tightly coupled to Bitcoin) but this may help slow down or reverse the ongoing price drop. The 5% of < $0.50 is if the smart contract update goes wrong or some anti-crypto legislation hits bitcoins price causes a crash similar to Jan 2018.

When I made my last forecast, the price was $1.21, now it's $2.04.  I still feel pretty confident about the $1.00 to $2.50 range, but now it seems there is a greater likelihood of it being on the high side than the low side.  Of course, all the crypto is extremely volatile, so hard to say what will happen.  It could double or halve between now and then.  But, notably, halving still keeps it in the $1.00 to $2.50 range.  I am flipping my upside and downside and throwing in a little extra to the upside.  There is no particularly rigorous reason.

+1 on $2.50-$5.00, but I still think it's unlikely. It's up 20% on being listed by the Kraken exchange but that only puts it at $1.65. It would still need to increase another 50% from that value to hit $2.50 and I just don't see it. https://www.coindesk.com/ada-cardano-staking-kraken

Considero que el proyecto realizado por los administradores de Cardano es realmente excepcional. Para realizar esta predicción me base en los siguientes puntos:
- Cardano se presenta a sí misma como una moneda de tercera generación, una moneda de primera generación es el Bitcoin, y una de segunda es el Ethereum. Por lo que esta nueva generación intenta suplir los errores que se cometieron en las monedas anteriores.
- El creador de Cardano es Charles Hoskinson, quien es cofundador de Ethereum y BitShares, por lo que claramente es un equipo con mucha experiencia en monedas de este tipo, que tiene una moneda, como lo es el Ethereum, que ya está siendo exitosa.
- El proceso de creación de la moneda busca que esta sea mucho más descentralizada que las dos monedas más exitosas del mercado, y de esta manera, le da mayor seguridad y solidez.
- El algoritmo sobre el cual está hecho Cardano es mucho más eficiente energéticamente que los algoritmos anteriormente conocidos, por lo que le permite realizar transacciones más rápidas y sea más amigable con el medio ambiente.
- Sin embargo, la secuencia de etapas que los administradores de Cardano tienen pensadas, necesariamente se deben hacer con tiempo, por lo que en los próximos 3 meses creo que no sufrirá subidas tan abruptas.
- Además, agrego un leve porcentaje a una caída en el precio, ya que elementos tan volátiles como lo son las criptomonedas, pueden sufrir este tipo de bajadas en sus precios
cryptocurrencies value is going up in general. Cardano's blockchain is considered the best blockchain ever developed. Cardano does the same and more as Ethereum and Bitcoin
Adjusting forecast away from $2.50 + options and more around the $1 mark.

Leaning into the change as it gets listed. I don't see a meteoric rise but I also don't see it collapsing. https://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/coins/cardanos-ada-token-jumps-18-after-coinbase-pro-listing/

Putting more weight towards $1.01-$5.00 based on the movements of the past week. I see a general increase on the price of Ada over the coming months outside of a big liquidity crunch which will send the coin price into one of the corners.

There is not enough volume. That’s why timing is the issue. Additionally, to many other competitors in this space. I’m waiting for the day cryptocurrency pegs with each other. For example quarters, dimes, nickels, etc etc. “can you spare a Ada”? Penny equivalent perhaps. Flash that.

February 22, 2021
129 days until close date.
ADA Price = $1.08
On the week: +21.6%
On the month:+205%
On the 3 month: + 999%
On the year: + 1794% Will Ada's price drop more than 43%?
	Has it changed more than 43% in last 129 days? Yes
Will Ada's price drop between 8% and 43%?
	Has it stay between 8% and 43% of it's current price in the last 129 days? No
Will Ada's price be stay remain between  -8% and 131%?
	Can the price stay the same or increase by up to 130? Yes
Will Ada's price increase by between 131% and 363%?
	Can the price increase by 100-400% within 4 months? Yes
Will Ada's price increase by more than 363%?
	Can the price increase by more than 363% in 4 months? Yes All outcomes are statistically possible. Cryptocurrencies are currently very volatile (in the positive almost exclusively).  Why would Ada's price go up substantially?
	• Momentum in the crypto currency sector, most if not all crypto platforms have seen excessive growth across 1 week / 1 month / 3 months / 6 months / 1 year
	• Current trajectory could continue
	• Further  federal stimulus could provide another large injection into equity markets including cryptocurrencies (bull market)
	• Economic uncertainly in equities could push investors out of equities and into cryptocurrencies, believing them to be a store of value
	• Global vaccinations and decreased wave peaks mean economic activity pickups up driving up asset prices

Why would Ada's price be the same or slightly higher in 129 days?
	• Currency is up large figures in the short/medium/long term, turns s-curve rather than bell-curve
	• Current price is all time high ($33.3B), market plateaus again
	• Mixture of stimulus and lockdown alleviations (at least temporarily) may give people money to spend other places, but they will continue holding current crypto positions
	• Price can inflate greatly and pop but end up at relative current price July 1 out of luck. Opposite is also possible. Why would Ada decrease in the next 129 days?
	• Cryptocurrencies are a bubble, people sell off to move to other asset classes
	• Ada is a bubble, the market momentum moves to other platforms or recognizes one/two top cryptos to support
	• Market illiquidity leads investors to sell off some/most crypto positions
	• Vulnerability in infrastructure/"plumbing" leads to large heist that shakes market confidence in the platform I put my bet on the corners. Price will change more than -43% or +131%, making the 2nd option a very low probability. Another 3x price change is 4 months is not out of the realm of possibility but I have some doubts. I don't see a market event taking the crypto sector in a negative direction in the 129 days before the question closes. Highest probability in the 131 - 363% increase, next is drop greater than 43%.
Rational of @Dustin-MacDonald + Crowd is 19% for 0.5-1 and 80% 1-2,5

Ada was launched 27 September 2017, it is 1242 days old. Ethereum was launched 30 July 2015. Dogecoin was launched 6 Dec 2013. Ethereum was 1242 days old on Sunday, December 23, 2018. Dogecoin was 1242 days old on Monday, May 1, 2017. On Dec 23 2018 Ethereum was worth . From 27 September 2017 to 1 July 2021 is 1373 days.
Adding 1373 days to Ethereum's start date we get May 3, 2019.
Adding 1373 days to Dogecoin's start date we get Oct 3 2017. There are 131 days left to predict the price of Ada. Ethereum's closing price from Sep 27 2017 to May 3 2019 was a minimum of $84.31 and a maximum of $1396.42, with a closing price on May 3 of $167.95. We don't have historical data for Dogecoin's entire run, but from Dec 9 2014 to Oct 3 2017 we see a MIN of $0.000087, and a max of $0.003873, closing on Oct 3 at $0.001108. From Oct 1 2017 (again, data limitations) to Feb 19 2021, Ada's price had a MIN of $0.018539, a max of $1.11412, and a Feb 19 close of $0.927649. Graphing the data we see a fairly consistent price from perhaps Dec 2018 to July 2020 when the price starts to uptick again. It's already very close to $1.00 right now, and bigger bubbles have happened, but Ada itself has never been above $1.11 so I suspect it will return there but not go much higher. It also is unlikely to collapse given that it has held its value for several years, but collapsing is more likely than a stratospheric rise. So, 80% that it will increase above $1, 12% that it will stay the same (50 cents and $1 where it is now), 5% that it collapses and falls below 50 cents, 2% chance that it goes between $2.50 and $5.00, and 1% chance that it goes above $5.
